name: jelly bean bunny
notes:
quick, cute and no sew!  at just 3.5”, the adorable jelly bean bunny can be made in an average of 25 minutes!  perfect for little gifts, craft tables, scrap busting, decor and more!

pattern pack discounts: 
use code:
2patterns10 for 10% off 2 patterns, 
3patterns15 for 15% off 3 patterns, 
4patterns20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns 

these discount codes are for individual patterns only and cannot be combined with other offers (e-books, pattern bundles, etc).

pattern is written showing light super bulky weight (6) yarns, feel free to experiment with your favourite amigurumi yarn and adjust your hook size accordingly (usually 2-3 sizes smaller than the hook size recommended on the yarn label).

crochet hook: 
5.0mm (h), clover amour crochet hook

materials: 
stuffing (polyfil)
removable stitch marker 
yarn needle to weave in ends 
scissors

yarn: 
light super bulky (6) - hobbii honey bunny

yardage: 
main colour - turquoise, candy floss, lemon curd, lilac (15 yards each), 
accent colours - hint of pink (light pink), and white (small amount each)

abbreviations/stitches
bobble st - bobble stitch
ch - chain
dc - double crochet
hdc - half double crochet
sc - single crochet
scdec - single crochet decrease
ss - slip stitch
st(s) -stitch(es)
treble bobble st - treble bobble stitch
*to* - repeat the sequence between the ** the number of times indicated
yo - yarn over

gauge: 
4 rounds of gauge pattern = 2.0 inch (light super bulky)

gauge pattern:
create a magic ring
round 1:    6sc in the ring (6)
round 2:    2sc in each stitch (12)
round 3:    *sc, 2sc* 6 times (18)
round 4:    *sc in the next 2 sts, 2sc* 6 times (24)

measurements/sizes: 
3.5 inches

skill level: 
intermediate
